title: Italian Cotton Travel Chinos with Stretch
description: Effortlessly elegant style that teams seamlessly with work shirts and blazers or a white polo shirt for a sophisticated evening look, our slim fit chinos are a wardrobe essential for the on-trend gent. Made from a cotton rich fabric for fantastic comfort, these men’s trousers are super soft, and with added stretch for comfort and crease recovery, they’re the ideal travel trouser too.
